body_html: I think lowering the numeric tolerance for float16 tests is fine here; I think we need to experiment more to find out how to make best use of batch norm for float16 but we don't need to block this PR on it.
body_text: I think lowering the numeric tolerance for float16 tests is fine here; I think we need to experiment more to find out how to make best use of batch norm for float16 but we don't need to block this PR on it.
body: I think lowering the numeric tolerance for float16 tests is fine here; I think we need to experiment more to find out how to make best use of batch norm for float16 but we don't need to block this PR on it.
